name: 5th International Conference on Data Mining and NLP
content: 5th International Conference on Data Mining and NLP (DNLP 2024) February 17 \~ 18, 2024, Dubai, UAE https://aisca2024.org/dnlp/index Scope &Topics 5th International Conference on Data Mining and NLP (DNLP 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Data mining and NLP. The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding Data mining and NLP concepts and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to this conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to the following Chunking/Shallow Parsing Data Mining Applications Data Mining in Modeling, Visualization, Personalization, and Recommendation Data Mining Systems and Platforms, Efficiency, Scalability, and Privacy Dialog Systems Discourse Foundations, Algorithms, Models, and Theory Information Extraction Information Retrieval Knowledge Processing Lexical Semantics Linguistic Resources Machine Translation Mining Text, Semi-Structured, Spatio-Temporal, Streaming, Graph, Web, Multimedia NLP and AI, Data Mining NLP and Computational Linguistics NLP and Information Retrieval NLP and Machine Learning Ontology Paraphrasing/Entailment/Generation Parsing/Grammatical Formalisms Phonology, Morphology POS Tagging Question Answering Semantic Processing Speech Recognition and Synthesis Spoken Language Processing Statistical and Knowledge based Methods Text Mining Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by February 03, 2024\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from DNLP 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issues of the following journals International Journal on Natural Language Computing (IJNLC) International Journal of Web & Semantic Technology (IJWesT) International Journal of Database Management Systems (IJDMS) - WJCI Indexed International Journal of Data Mining & Knowledge Management Process (IJDKP) - WJCI Indexed Advanced Computing: An International Journal (ACIJ) - WJCI Indexed Information Technology in Industry (ITII) Important Dates Submission Deadline : February 03, 2024 Authors Notification : February 14, 2024 Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due : February 15, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : dnlp@aisca2024.org or dnlpconf@yahoo.com For other details: https://aisca2024.org/dnlp/index Paper Submission Link: https://aisca2024.org/submission/index.php
